buildCommand: cd client && npm install && npm run build

headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https: blob: http: *; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://unpkg.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https: http: wss: ws:;
